doc.course_introduction: Learn the general concepts of data mining along with basic methodologies and applications. Then dive into one subfield in data mining: pattern discovery. Learn in-depth concepts, methods, and applications of pattern discovery in data mining. We will also introduce methods for pattern-based classification and some interesting applications of pattern discovery. This course provides you the opportunity to learn skills and content to practice and engage in scalable pattern discovery methods on massive transactional data, discuss pattern evaluation measures, and study methods for mining diverse kinds of patterns, sequential patterns, and sub-graph patterns.
doc.course_tag: Data Visualization Software//Tableau Software//Data Virtualization//Data Visualization (DataViz)

doc.reviews: ['Good course but need some thing to do:', 'Too much background information, not enough information critical to applicable demands.', 'most horrible specialization in coursera! Time wasted', 'seemed to me the best course of the specialization', 'The lectures introduces various ways of visualizing data.', 'Very nice course. It encourages you to learn different data visualization tools for completing the assignments. And, peer graded assignments are too beneficial since, they give you a sight of how other peers are completing their work and all. Lecture videos too are awesome!!', 'Really like this course which leads me to Tableau. After the course, I take about 8 hours to learn Tableau and I think my ability of data visualization ballooned.', 'Good course, very well structured and with interesting assignments. Some (especially first) lessons are more of a general culture but most are very helpful and allow to learn a lot of things.', 'Very solid data visualization class for people interesting in visualization. It explains a lot of knowledge under the hood. Not that fit for people who just want to learn some tools and quick skills. It is computer science. ', 'Bueno para obtener ideas de que hacer, pero necesitas saber programar a nivel basico', 'The fundamental concept part and assignments are good.', 'nice course', "Ce cours est plein de connaissances utiles et permet d'acquérir un background important en matière de visualisation de données", 'Very interesting and engaging', 'This knowledge is fantastic.', 'Excelent general concepts of data mining along with basic methodologies and applications, congratulations...¡¡¡', 'it is good.,', 'I like it! Very useful!', 'Interesting course for getting started with complex graphing principles. The instructor was easy to follo', 'Good course ', 'Very good knowledge on visualization. Never though these many indepth concepts are involved in visualizations. ', 'Good primer on data visualization.', 'Excellent introduction, well paced and interesting', 'nide course', 'Great']
